job.title: Tech Sales Representative (Remote / Entry Level)
job.description: ltpgtfind your purpose ampamp find your futureltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttech sales is about more than just financial rewards its your chance to work remotely in a career of ltstronggtunlimited opportunityltstronggt that challenges inspires and grows with youltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtlaunch your career in the thriving tech industry with satellites career accelerator like our other successful students advance from your current job and start earning k per yearltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtover the course of our comprehensive week program taught by industry professionals you will learn the skills and make the connections you need to land a job with an outstanding tech company in our hiring network we provide coaching mentorship and ongoing support you just need to bring your energy and motivated self course tuition is fully covered by our generous community partners so the only cost to you is a nominal onboarding feeltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtbegin your transformation todayltpgt
